title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9760.7 - Current list of records available for inspection and copying
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9760.7 - Current list of records available for inspection and copying

State Regulations
(a) A current list, by subject matter, of the
records of the corporation shall be maintained by the records access officer
and shall be available for public inspection and copying, in accordance with
this Part. (b) In addition to the
list provided for in subdivision (a) of this section, the records access
officer shall maintain (1) a record of the final vote of each director of the
corporation in every proceeding of the corporation in which the director votes
and (2) a record setting forth the name, public office address, title and
public salary of every officer and employee of the
corporation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9760.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
